meanings.definition: Having a strong desire to eat snacks or small meals frequently.
meanings.sent1: She is the munchiest person I know, always snacking on something.
meanings.sent2: The kids at the party were the munchiest, devouring all the cookies and chips.
meanings.sent3: Even the dog seemed munchiest when he saw the treats in her hand.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes lit up with the munchiest excitement when she saw the buffet spread.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked cookies made her feel the munchiest she had ever felt.

meanings.definition: The act of eating snacks or small meals frequently.
meanings.sent1: Her constant munching earned her the title of the munchiest in the office.
meanings.sent2: The munchiest at the party was a little girl who kept going back for more cake.
meanings.sent3: The munchiest in the group was always the first to suggest a snack break.
meanings.sent4: The munchiest in the family was known for always having a bag of chips handy.
meanings.sent5: The sound of munching echoed through the room, signaling the presence of the munchiest.
